title: Royal International Air Tattoo 2024
description: A collection of images from the Royal International Air Tattoo 2024, featuring various aircraft and aerobatic displays.

images.description: A Canadian CF-18 Hornet preparing for takeoff.
A close-up view of a powerful jet engine.
An F-16 Fighting Falcon parked on the tarmac.
A lineup of various aircraft on the tarmac.
The Red Arrows performing the 'Big Vixen' formation.
The Red Arrows in their iconic Diamond 9 formation.
The Red Arrows performing the 'Tornado' maneuver, with two jets executing barrel rolls around a seven-aircraft formation.
Another view of the Red Arrows' 'Tornado' maneuver, showcasing the precision and skill of the pilots.
